title: "Chinese EV Startup Polestone Begins Taking Orders for Its First Model"
excerpt: "(Yicai) Aug. 23 -- Two and a half years after its establishment, Chinese electric vehicle startup Polestone has officially opened reservations for its first model. Polestone, which is owned by Rox Motor, will accept orders for the Polestone 01 from today, with deliveries expected to begin in November."
